original_title: Athletic Yoga Workout with Maureen Solomon
overview: In this innovative and invigorating workout, instructor Maureen Solomon takes the calm-inducing poses of yoga and steps them up a notch, helping your body build strength and flexibility as you de-stress. Beginning with a series of traditional standing yoga movements, Solomon quickly progresses to the floor for more advanced yoga forms -- even adding the resistance of a physical therapy tool known as the T-roller.
title: Athletic Yoga Workout with Maureen Solomon
